title: Retrieve member feedback counts
description: Returns feedback summary information for a member.

path.name: memberId
path.description: The ID of the member to retrieve feedback summary information for.

query.name: since
query.description: Ignores any feedback from before this date.

fields.name: TotalCount
fields.description: The total of the feedback taking unique postive and negative counts into account.

fields.name: TotalPositive
fields.description: The number of positive feedback given.

fields.name: UniquePositive
fields.description: The number of individuals who have left feedback.

fields.name: TotalNeutral
fields.description: The number of neutral feedback given.

fields.name: TotalNegative
fields.description: The number of negative feedback given.

fields.name: UniqueNegative
fields.description: The number of negative feedback given.

fields.name: Nickname
fields.description: The nickname of the member. Some characters may be changed, if we determine it is necessary to protect the member's privacy.

fields.name: LastLoggedIn
fields.description: The time the member last logged in.

fields.name: TwoMonthListingCount
fields.description: The number of listing in the past 2 months by this member.

fields.name: IsAuthenticated
fields.description: Indicates whether the member has been authenticated.
